entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:59 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
